questions.question: Does the organization maintain an up-to-date inventory of physical devices and software assets?
Are cybersecurity roles and responsibilities defined and communicated?
Is a risk management strategy established and implemented?
Are access permissions and authorizations managed and reviewed?
Are data-at-rest and data-in-transit protected via encryption?
Are security awareness and training programs provided regularly?
Are maintenance and protective technologies implemented and monitored?
Are anomalous activity detection systems in place?
Are continuous security monitoring tools implemented?
Is an incident response plan documented and tested regularly?
Are incidents reported and analyzed for root causes?
Is a recovery plan in place for restoring systems after cybersecurity incidents?
Are backups performed and tested regularly?
Are supply chain risks identified and managed?
Are vulnerabilities scanned and remediated timely?
Is multi-factor authentication implemented for critical systems?
Are secure configurations applied to hardware and software?
Is network segmentation used to reduce attack surface?
Are audit logs collected and regularly reviewed?
Is cybersecurity risk management integrated into enterprise risk processes?
